languages.text: {n}Издевательский взгляд Маражая упирается в вас.{/n} "Совершенно непредсказуемый поворот событий... верно, {name}?"
{n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Издевательский взгляд Маражая упирается в вас.{/n} "Совершенно непредсказуемый поворот событий... верно, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"
{n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"
{n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"
{n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋以嘲弄的目光看着你。{/n}“居然会发生这样的后果，这还真是让人意想不到……是吧，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋以嘲弄的目光看着你。{/n}“居然会发生这样的后果，这还真是让人意想不到……是吧，{name}？”

languages.text: {n}La mirada burlona de Marazhai se posa sobre ti.{/n} «Un giro completamente inesperado de los hechos... ¿no crees, {name}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada burlona de Marazhai se posa sobre ti.{/n} «Un giro completamente inesperado de los hechos... ¿no crees, {name}?».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイのあざ笑うような眼差しがあなたに注がれる。{/n}「まったく予想外の展開だな…そうだろう、{name}？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイのあざ笑うような眼差しがあなたに注がれる。{/n}「まったく予想外の展開だな…そうだろう、{name}？」

languages.text: {n}Le regard moqueur de Marazhai se pose sur vous.{/n} « Voilà qui était totalement imprévisible... n'est-ce pas, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard moqueur de Marazhai se pose sur vous.{/n} « Voilà qui était totalement imprévisible... n'est-ce pas, {name} ? »

languages.text: {n}Marazhais spöttischer Blick ruht auf dir.{/n} "Eine vollkommen unvorhersehbare Wendung ... Nicht wahr, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais spöttischer Blick ruht auf dir.{/n} "Eine vollkommen unvorhersehbare Wendung ... Nicht wahr, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın alay eden gözleri seni izliyor.{/n} "Tamamen öngörülemez bir olay zinciri... Değil mi {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking gaze rests on you.{/n} "An entirely unpredictable turn of events... Isn't that right, {name}?"
